text: A kogda im govoryat: "Boytes' togo, chto bylo s narodami, byvshimi do vas, za oproverzheniye very v Allakha, i boytes' nakazaniya v budushchey zhizni, kotoromu vy budete podvergat'sya za vashe nastoychivoye neveriye teper', - mozhet byt', Allakh poshchadit vas, yesli vy Yego budete boyat'sya!" - no oni otvrashchayutsya ot etogo uveshchevaniya
